text: A Little Oblique is a self-released compilation. This is by dance producer deadmau5. It is one of his most obscure albums, as it was finished on his SectionZ page. It includes many songs which were later released on other albums (such as Vexillology) and collaborations with Melleefresh and Steve Duda. == Track listing == == References == * https://web.archive.org/web/20070818172638/http://www.sectionz.com/album_detail.asp?albumID=184 Category:deadmau5 albums Category:2006 albums
title: A Little Oblique
